backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor definition with no functions or logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing deployment of the marketing site to IC mainnet and linking related components and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing pre-generated summaries of various frontend files and their roles in the site.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide detailing prerequisites and steps to build and deploy the marketing site to IC mainnet.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining color tokens, theme variables, and global styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with SEO metadata, favicons, font loading, and root mount point for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component assembling the site layout with header, footer, and all main sections.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer component displaying branding, quick links, contact info, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Fixed header with smooth-scroll navigation, responsive menu, and a CTA button.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutCa: Section highlighting four company capabilities using icons and brief descriptions.
frontend/src/components/sections/Benefit: Section showcasing four key carpet benefits with icons and short text.
frontend/src/components/sections/Collect: Renders a grid of carpet collection cards with images, descriptions, and features.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Displays contact options and call‑to‑action buttons using phone and email details from config.
frontend/src/components/sections/Gallery: Provides a filterable image gallery with category selection and modal image viewing.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Shows a hero banner with background image and buttons that scroll to gallery or contact sections.
frontend/src/config/contact.ts: Exports centralized phone and email contact information.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook handling login, stored identity loading, and authentication state.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind and defines custom CSS variables, themes, and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project's state, versioning, and a list of features describing requirements for a simplified single-page marketing and gallery-focused website.
